definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
to act arbitrarily regardless of the rules/to mess with sth/to make a hash of things/to cause trouble
to disobey/to defy/deliberately going against (rule, convention, sb's wishes etc)
how could one dare?/I don't deserve such praise
lit. to stroke the tiger's whiskers/to do sth very daring
to offend sb/to give offense/to displease
to keep quiet out of fear (idiom)
talkative/to speak out of turn/to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/rumors fly
